Name: Sweet Manhattan (batched recipe)
Ingredients: 300 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
5 ml Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
COMBINE all ingredients and stir (without ice).
POUR into a litre bottle and leave to chill in a refrigerator.
To serve, STIR 2 shots / 2oz / 60ml of the bottled mixture with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Express an orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish each cocktail with a skewered maraschino cherry.
Review: Bourbon and rye whiskies form a robust base with hints of both maraschino and cherry brandy liqueurs adding flavour and richness alongside Italian vermouth. This recipe makes 16 cocktails and is also perfect for making a barrel-aged Manhattan to fill a one-litre mini cask.
History: Created in 2016 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. See: Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Sweet Manhattan (batched recipe) contains 2023 calories
